channel.title: Astral rune help
channel.description:
I download the source/client - Hybrid Pvp - ive been coding alot on it , a things i need help with : When i have the runes to veng it does let me veng but on the spells it dosnt light up to show i have full runes and it says 0/4 astral runes , although i have them in my inventory the veng will still work when i do have them in my inventory but just dosnt show up?
I AM USING PROJECT INSANITY Thanks if someone could please help me asap it would be great !
